Akuma Bodysuit (bottom) - alternate
description

Feel like Akuma from Street Fighter IV with this alternate bodysuit bottom! The tattered style of this bodysuit is proof of the endless battles you have fought! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Prenez-vous pour Akuma de Street Fighter IV avec ce bas de costume alternatif ! Ses marques trahissent le nombre de combats qu'il a traversé ! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Fühle dich mit diesem alternativen unteren Teil eines Bodysuits wie Akuma aus Street Fighter IV! Der ausgefranste Stil dieses Kleidungsstücks zeugt von den unzähligen Kämpfen, in die du verwickelt warst! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
Diventa Akuma di Street Fighter IV con la parte sotto di questo costume alternativo! Gli squarci e i brandelli sono prova di innumerevoli scontri! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
¡Ponte este disfraz alternativo (p. inferior) y siéntete como Akuma de Street Fighter IV! ¡La prueba definitiva de los combates que has superado! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
ストリートファイター4 豪鬼になりきることができるアレンジ ver.のボディスーツ （下） 擦り切れたスタイルは修羅の道を進んできた証 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 아쿠마가 되는 어렌지 ver. 도복(하의). 해어진 옷은 아쿠마가 걸어온 인생을 나타내는 증표. Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Feel like Akuma from Street Fighter IV with this alternate bodysuit bottom! The tattered style of this bodysuit is proof of the endless battles you have fought! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Akuma的特別版身體服裝 (下)。衣服磨破的風格是走過修羅之路的證據。 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
STREET FIGHTER IV 可以化身為Akuma的特別版身體服裝 (下)。衣服磨破的風格是走過修羅之路的證據。 Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]

Feel like Akuma from Street Fighter IV with this alternate bodysuit bottom! The tattered style of this bodysuit is proof of the endless battles you have fought! Street Fighter IV © CAPCOM U.S.A., Inc.[#Legal]
